posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bill Cornell
All cards are sold

Very nice fronts and some back damage from scrapbook removal - scans below.  I'm asking $30 each, but buy 2 or more and take 10% off.  Any type of payment is fine.  [URL="bill@t207.com"]Email me[/URL] if interested - first come, first served.  Thanks.

Bill
